test.name: tftp
test.label: TFTP Test
test.description: Verify that the specified TFTP server is functioning properly.
test.longDescription: Phone configuration files produced by the @sipxecs.name@ Configuration Server can optionally be served by a TFTP server. This test verifies that the specified TFTP server can be used to retrieve a special phone configuration test file which has been produced by the Configuration Server.

result.msg: TFTP server address could not be resolved.
result.description: The specified TFTP server address could not be resolved to an IP address. Verify that the DNS server(s) have a valid entry.
The resolved IP address of the specified TFTP server did not respond to ICMP pings. Verify that the server is running and reachable from this network.
The test client has suffered an unrecoverable network failure. Please see the details for further information.

result.msg: TFTP get of test file failed.
result.description: The specified TFTP server failed to serve the test configuration file. Verify that the TFTP server is running and properly configured.

result.msg: TFTP test file did not verify.
result.description: The test file that was retrieved from the specified TFTP server was found to be corrupted. Please contact technical support for further assistance.
